SELECT A.PAYMENT_SN AS PAYMENT_SN ,A.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,A.NAME AS NAME ,A.TEL AS TEL ,A.EMAIL AS EMAIL ,A.STL_MONEY AS STL_MONEY ,A.STL_DTM AS STL_DTM ,B.PAYMENT_CMPL_YN AS PAYMENT_CMPL_YN FROM STL A LEFT JOIN PAYMENT B ON (A.PAYMENT_SN = B.PAYMENT_SN) WHERE 1=1
AND A.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT(#searchValue#, '%')
AND A.NAME LIKE CONCAT(#searchValue#, '%')
ORDER BY A.STL_DTM ASC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT A.PAYMENT_SN AS PAYMENT_SN ,A.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,A.NAME AS NAME ,A.TEL AS TEL ,A.EMAIL AS EMAIL ,A.STL_MONEY AS STL_MONEY ,A.STL_DTM AS STL_DTM ,B.PAYMENT_CMPL_YN AS PAYMENT_CMPL_YN FROM STL A LEFT JOIN PAYMENT B ON (A.PAYMENT_SN = B.PAYMENT_SN) WHERE A.STL_NO = #STL_NO#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STL WHERE 1=1
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT(#searchValue#, '%')
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT(#searchValue#, '%')
